name: nimbus/isaac-skeleton-viewer
description:
Showing skeletons's persons
git: https://github.com/cognimbus/nimbus.library/tree/master/Library/Components/
License: BSD

inputStreams.name: image_in
inputStreams.description: The uncompressed image from the webcam (Raw uncompressed image in a RGB format).

inputStreams.name: skeletons
inputStreams.description: 2D real-time multi person keypoint detection: 25-keypoint body/foot keypoint estimation.

outputStreams.name: skeleton_image
outputStreams.description: The input image with the keypoint detection.
